name: MLCTensorData
desc: An encapsulation of the memory that tensor data uses.

items.name: init(bytesNoCopy: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, length: Int)
items.desc: Creates a tensor data instance with the buffer of data and length of bytes you specify.

items.name: init(bytesNoCopy: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, length: Int, deallocator: (UnsafeMutableRawPointer, Int) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a tensor data instance with a data buffer, byte length, and custom deallocator closure you specify.

items.name: init(immutableBytesNoCopy: UnsafeRawPointer, length: Int)
items.desc: Creates a tensor data instance with the buffer of immutable data and length of bytes you specify.

items.name: var length: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes you choose to hold for this tensor data instance.
